QuestData.Title: The Dawning Light
QuestData.Description: It was a miracle that you were able to survive, $n. It is with great sorrow that I have to say that Grand Master Hight was not so lucky. His spirit now rests with the ancestors.$b$bNow we must look to a new leader for our order, our broken temple. I have spoken with the other masters and we are all of one mind on this.$b$bWe all agree that new leader should be you, $n. You have shown strength, wisdom, courage, and kindness beyond measure.$b$bWalk with us to the temple and we will announce our decision.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Fearsome Jang and await the masters' announcement.

Objectives.Objective: Establish the Order of The Broken Temple
